member.summary: Sets the default visibility for options not otherwise specified.

member.summary: Returns a new instance of ErrorPageOptions with all visibility options enabled by default.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Diagnostics.ErrorPageOptions.ShowExceptionDetails
member.summary: Enables the display of exception types, messages, and stack traces.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Diagnostics.ErrorPageOptions.ShowSourceCode
member.summary: Enabled the display of local source code around exception stack frames.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Diagnostics.ErrorPageOptions.SourceCodeLineCount
member.summary: Determines how many lines of code to include before and after the line of code present in an exception's stack frame. Only applies when symbols are available and source code referenced by the exception stack trace is present on the server.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Diagnostics.ErrorPageOptions.ShowQuery
member.summary: Enables the enumeration of any parsed query values.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Diagnostics.ErrorPageOptions.ShowCookies
member.summary: Enables the enumeration of any parsed request cookies.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Diagnostics.ErrorPageOptions.ShowHeaders
member.summary: Enables the enumeration of the request headers.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Diagnostics.ErrorPageOptions.ShowEnvironment
member.summary: Enables the enumeration of the OWIN environment values.

member.summary: IAppBuilder extension methods for the ErrorPageMiddleware.

member.name: M:Owin.ErrorPageExtensions.UseErrorPage(Owin.IAppBuilder)
member.summary: Captures synchronous and asynchronous exceptions from the pipeline and generates HTML error responses. Full error details are only displayed by default if 'host.AppMode' is set to 'development' in the IAppBuilder.Properties.

member.name: M:Owin.ErrorPageExtensions.UseErrorPage(Owin.IAppBuilder,Microsoft.Owin.Diagnostics.ErrorPageOptions)
member.summary: Captures synchronous and asynchronous exceptions from the pipeline and generates HTML error responses. Full error details are only displayed by default if 'host.AppMode' is set to 'development' in the IAppBuilder.Properties.

member.summary: Captures synchronous and asynchronous exceptions from the pipeline and generates HTML error responses.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Diagnostics.WelcomePageOptions.Path
member.summary: Specifies which requests paths will be responded to. Exact matches only. Leave null to handle all requests.
